readme:
# FB2WP 

> - A NodeJS bot for republish Wordpress blog post from Facebook page.

## Requires 

1. WordPress 3.4 or newer
2. Facebook page and Facebook App
3. NodeJS(tested on 0.12.x) or IOJS

## Installation

Download the source code with git or zip file.

```
npm install 
```

## Usage

```
node bot.js
```
